title: California's Woolsey Fire
description: Data from the Multi-angle Imaging SpectroRadiometer (MISR) instrument aboard NASA's Terra satellite was used to produce this stereo anaglyph of the Woolsey Fire in southern California on Nov. 11, 2018. Check full 3D image on JPL.
theme:
FALSE – COLOR. Satellites show what human
eyes can't see
